name: Simpled Group
tag_list: property-management-assets, crm, mobile, digital, real-estate, payment, banking, tablet-fieldbox
overview:
Simpled Group N.V. is a privately held Netherlands based techno company. We specialize in building and boosting global technology brands and serviced technologies. Our trademarks are unique, fast and most of all truly simple. Simpled’s strengths beholds in it’s unrivaled credibility and global network. Our worldwide connections and preferred partners help us to build sustainable and believable brands, equipped with our own technology and management.

Simpled Group N.V. maintains and beholds full circled complementary service models specialized within:

  • Property Management for Assets (Real Estate, Oil & Gas, Yachts, Aerospace, Medical)
  • Digital Field Service Management (Service Ticket Inspection Management, CRM)
  • Mobile Communication (Voice over IP, Video, Machine-to-machine)
  • Mobile applications (Building, Branding and Reselling)
  • Invoice, Payment Processing and Factoring.
